findings.title: Non-whitelisted wallet can only transfer a specified number of tokens to a specified address
findings.description: A non-whitelisted wallet is restricted from transferring more than a certain amount of tokens to a specific address, which prevents bots from making transactions at 'addLiquidity' block.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The smart contract owner can mint an unlimited number of tokens to a specified wallet through the 'DevRelease' and 'TeamRelease' functions, which poses centralization risks.
